input_email_body:
Subject: Google Cloud Security Protocols in Healthcare

Hello customer support, I am writing to ask about the recommended security protocols for Google Cloud Platform in healthcare. Could you share the necessary measures to ensure the security and compliance of sensitive healthcare data on the platform? I would greatly appreciate any guidance or resources you could offer You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Thank you for your time and assistance. I am looking forward to your response. My name is Carlos Mendoza.
